data.message: Facebook!!!...so not happy with you right now!  You created more icons for your "what's trending" column which made me very happy as to avoid spoiler alerts but I'm watching the Djokovic/Federer match right now on the West Coast and you just announced the winner in the main column....how very inconsiderate of you....shame on you...I've been looking forward to this semi-final all morning.....thanks for spoiling it...DUH!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Debra, but we appreciate your feedback. We're working hard to ensure that our updates improve Facebook for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1QHSAgs. Thanks. -Kate

At first your "trending column" announced everything, then you created the different icons for sports, politics and I thought...finally you get it but please take into consideration that you just actaully announced the winner while the West Coast is watching the match!!!  Could you please say something in trending like "see who just won in the first semi-final at the Australian Open...click on the "sports" icon right now....can you tell I'm a tennis fan.  I will say THANK YOU for responding this time....I know i'm just a little fish in your ocean but so glad someone is reading this...Please see if you could not do the spoiler...thanks again, from a loyal senior citizen Facebook follower.
how come when windows 10 updates or attempt  to I lose access to games I play
